title: Where can we get Karnataka SSLC question papers? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are looking for Sample Papers then you can refer Oswaal Karnataka SSLC Sample Question Papers for Class 10. These Sample Papers include 10 sample papers which are bifurcated as- 1–5 Solved & 6–10 for Self-Assessment. I think they will really be very helpful for self evaluation and will also give greater insights into the paper pattern. Some of the benefits of solving these papers are: They include latest typologies of questions, suggested by the board.They also have scheme of evaluation with detailed explanation.The most helpful are the cognitive learning tools like mind maps, revision notes and concept video.If you’ll solve them religiously, I think they will be really helpful.
